alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 1:51PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade County through 215 PM EDT... At 151 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Miami Springs, or over Hialeah. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miami, Hialeah, Coral Gables, Miami Gardens, North Miami, Doral, Miami Lakes, Hialeah Gardens, Opa-Locka, Miami Springs, Miami Shores, West Miami, El Portal, Medley, West Little River, Gladeview, Westview, Palm Springs North, Country Club and Miami International Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
